short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display information from wikipedia relating to highlighted text

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Wiki Search is an open-source, free productivity tool for Google Chrome.

Select a word or phrase on a web page and click the extension icon for a short 500 character summary of the relevant Wikipedia page. If you want to read more about a word or phrase, feel free to click the 'read more' button at the bottom of the extension popup. This will open a new tab with the full Wikipedia page.

Wikipedia page extracts are retrieved from the MediaWiki API.
